title: Strength of Spirit (1C85)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Response: If a companion is about to exert, spot Gandalf to place no token for that exertion.
Lore:	”'There are many powers in the world, for good or for evil. Some are greater than I am. Against some I have not yet been measured. But my time is coming.'”
Rarity:	C
